Description:
A CLASSIC HOME ON AROUND 1,008SQM WITH DEVELOPMENT POTENTIAL (STCA)
Even with a quick inspection of this classic home you can clearly see it has been beautifully maintained throughout its life and its condition is testament to its caring long term owners. Resting on a flat block measuring around 1,008sqm, the home is a prime candidate for further development where you could keep the home and build behind, or simply start from scratch and design a stylish modern unit development (all options are STCA). Behind its pale painted facade you find a warm and inviting home featuring a generous lounge room with gas heater and a split system air conditioner plus a meals area integrated in to the pristine kitchen and a separate study or work area. There are 3 robed bedrooms and a family bathroom that is complemented by a laundry with additional shower facilities and a separate toilet. Outside, you find a large covered patio for entertaining and a massive yard with great potential for tradesmen and hobbyists with the massive 4 car garage plus workshop a great bonus. It's even well positioned with schools and central Clayton's shops, cafes, buses and trains all nearby.
Insights: 35 Manoon Road, Clayton South VIC 3169 was last sold in 2014 and 63 other 3 bedroom house in Clayton South have recently been sold.

Description:
Ideal First Home or Downsizer!
This lovely and spacious three bedroom unit ticks all the boxes. With a large lounge area with floating floors serviced by a split system air conditioner and a gas wall heater, with a door leading out to a great private outside area. Kitchen with gas stove and meals area, separate toilet and a good sized laundry. The three bedrooms all have wardrobes, WIR to the main bedroom and BIR to the other two bedrooms.
Features include:
• Gas wall heater
• Split system air conditioner
• Work shed in back yard
• Single lock up garage AND a single carport
• Rheem hot water service
• Separate toilet
Close to centre road, only 1.5 km to Clayton train station and main strip shops, close to Monash university and hospital, this location is ideal for first home buyers, investors and downsizers!
Please call to arrange a time to inspect.

Description:
Modern 3 Bedroom Home in a Fantastic Location!
How good is this superbly presented, quality single storey residence in the best location, boasting very large living areas, spacious bedrooms and exceptional privacy on a quiet street? Within walking distance to Clayton Shopping Strips, Community Centre, Clayton Train Station, Westall Train Station and a short drive to Monash University, Monash Medical Centre, IKEA Home Centre, Chadstone Shopping Centres, you will not find a better growth location!
As you walk into this superb high quality and well-designed home with polish hardwood floors, this property boasts a stunning floorplan consisting of three spacious bedrooms, stylish central bathroom, large open plan kitchen with dining area, stainless-steel appliances, glass splashback and plenty of storage, spacious lounge area, central hydronic heating and evaporative cooling system, landscaped gardens, perfect for outdoor entertaining family and friends. Parking is available in secure carport.
Core features include corner block, beautiful hardwood floorboards, high ceilings, brand new modern kitchen and bathroom, central ducted heating and air conditioning, secure and easily accessible front and back yards, , what more could you want?
Last chance to inspect and secure this fantastic property, the unique residence in the area!

Description:
Stylish Modern 3 Bedroom Home in a Fantastic Location!
How good is this superbly presented, quality single storey residence in the best location, boasting open living area, spacious bedrooms and exceptional privacy on a quiet street? With an easy walk to bus stops, Clayton & Clayton Shopping Strips, Community Centre, Clayton Train Station, Monash Medical Centre and a short drive to Monash University, IKEA Home Maker and Chadstone Shopping Centres, you will not find a better growth location!
As you walk into this superb high quality and well-designed home, this property boasts a stunning floorplan consisting of three spacious bedrooms including the master bedroom that has a walk in wardrobe and a trendy ensuite to complement the family bathroom with luxurious corner spa, large open plan kitchen with granite island benchtop, stainless-steel appliances, glass splashback, dishwasher and plenty of storage. The living area opens up to low maintenance backyard, perfect for outdoor entertaining with family and friends. Parking is available in the spacious remote-controlled lock up garage, as well an additional car space in front of garage.
Core features include high ceilings, a split system air conditioner, single garage with remote controlled door and a low maintenance private courtyard. Equally suited to occupiers and investors, the location is within walking distance of buses and strip shopping with central Clayton, schools and trains all easily accessible., what more could you want?
Last chance to inspect and secure this fantastic property, the best unique residence in the area!

Description:
There Are Great Opportunities Here!
Consider the possibilities - this property is primed for redevelopment (subject to council approvals) and with a location like this it presents a splendid opportunity. There's easy access to Monash Medical Centre, Monash University, and major roads, and it is only a short drive to large shopping centres such as the Ikea Home Maker Centre in Springvale. Trains, parks, local shops, and recreation are all within walking distance, and buses virtually stop at the front door. Land size is approximately 628.5sq m - perfectly suited to a dream home or perhaps a development. The 3-bedroom weatherboard home, presently occupying the site, has seen faithful service but it is probably nearing retirement age.

Description:
One for Investors or Nesters!
On the corner of Aonach Street, and conveniently situated to shops, schools, reserves and public transport, this single-storey villa-style home has its own private and secure front courtyard garden plus a separate garden beside the carport. The timber floors have been buffed and polished, and the paintwork has been freshened but there's still scope for further renovation if desired. The home includes a living room with space heater, a separate kitchen, 2 bedrooms with built-in wardrobes, and a bathroom with laundry facilities. Look to this property as a worthy addition to an investment portfolio or an ideal starter home.

Description:
CLASSIC FAMILY HOME WITH DEVELOPMENT OPTIONS!
Attention home buyers, developers and investors!
This one owner family home located ‘on the boarder’ with Clayton boasts all the classic charm of yesteryear. A great opportunity currently exists for the home to be retained and a second dwelling constructed to the rear (STCA).
The home features a large entrance hall, generous formal living room (or fourth bedroom), chef-friendly kitchen with meals zone, traditional family bathroom, three spacious bedrooms, family room, separate laundry, secure garage and carport. (NOTE: Floor plan available upon request).
Additional features include gas heating, air conditioning, timber flooring (under carpets), wide driveway, superb rear garden and more.
FOR THE DEVELOPERS: A wide driveway measuring approximately 3.5m and generous rear yard measuring approximately 18m (depth) X 15.50m (width) should allow for a second dwelling to be constructed at the rear (STCA). Removing the existing family room extension will allow even more room for a larger second dwelling (STCA). Rear yard is orientated towards the north.
This exceptional property is located within reach of Clayton Village, Clayton Train Station, Monash Hospital, Monash University, Clayton Aquatic Centre, various bus routes, golf courses, parks and more.
Inspection highly recommended!

Description:
Modern 2 Bedroom Home in a Prime Location!
A quality single storey residence in a prime location, boasting very large living and dining areas, spacious bedrooms and exceptional privacy being the back unit in the block. With an easy walk to Clayton Shopping Strips, Community Centre, Clayton Train Station, minutes away from Monash University, John Monash Science School, Monash Medical Centre and a short drive to IKEA Home Makerand Chadstone Shopping Centres, you will not find a better growth location!
As you walk into this high quality and well-designed home, you will see that it boasts a stunning floorplan consisting of two spacious bedrooms, stylish central bathroom with bath, large open plan kitchen, dishwasher and plenty of storage, separate laundry, lounge area with split system, central ducting heating. The dining area opens private court yard, landscaped gardens, perfect for outdoor entertaining with family and friends. Parking is available in lock up garage, as well an additional car space in front of garage.
Core features include beautiful floorboards, spacious living and dining areas, modern central bathroom, central ducted heating, split system, secure back yards, what more could you want?
Last chance to inspect and secure this fantastic property, the best unique residence in the area!

ONLY 1 LEFT! Brand New Townhouses! Walk to Clayton Central & Train Station!
A perfect opportunity arises to secure these exceptional luxury designer townhouses built to phenomenal standards situated in one of best locations in Clayton. Within walking distance to Clayton Central, Clayton Train Station, Clayton Community Center, Monash Medical Center, local schools, parks and minutes away from Monash University, you could not ask for a better growth location!
Unit 1 has 3 bedrooms, 3 bathroom, 3 toilets, and single lock up garage
Unit 2 has 3 bedrooms, 3 bathroom, 3 toilets, and double lock up garage
Unit 3 has 3 bedrooms / 2 Bedrooms plus study, 3 bathrooms, 3 toilets, single lock up garage
Features include Hardwood floors, LED down lights throughout, central ducted heating and separate air conditioning units, instant hot water system, stainless steel kitchen with 40mm stone bench tops, fantastic architectural design and much much more.
Buy now and save thousands on stamp duty!
10% deposit and settlement upon completion in June 2015.

First home owner's grant of $10,000 apply to eligible clients for brand new homes!

DELUXE DESIGN WITH HUGE STAMP DUTY SAVINGS
To be constructed by reputable WestUrban Group, these striking architect-designed 3 bedroom town-residences will offer sensational style and quality with impressive proportions delivering an exceptional opportunity to first home buyers, young families and investors. To be finished with the very latest in contemporary fixtures and neutral colour palette, each will comprise of an open plan living and dining zone, superbly equipped 2pack kitchen with Caesar Stone benches and private landscaped courtyard. Bathrooms, ensuites and powder rooms will all be finished with Porcelain tiles, stylish vanities and semi-frameless shower screens. Providing an easy-care lifestyle these comprehensively equipped homes will feature polished bamboo flooring, ducted heating and cooling, robes to all bedrooms, remote garages with additional carspace walking distance to train station, Westall Secondary College, local shops and Springvale Homemaker Centre. Buy now off the plan and take advantage of huge stamp duty savings!

Set well back on the block, this neat three bedroom home is an ideal starting point for first home buyers or for investors, providing an exceptional location that's within arms reach to Westall Secondary College, the train station and an easy connection to shops and to Monash Freeway.

Description:
Developers and Investors - 877sqm Endless Possibilities!
Fantastic opportunity to secure this large family home located within walking distance to Clayton shops, train station, local schools and parks as well as only minutes away from Monash Medical Centre, Monash University and Monash Freeway. Property comprises wide entry hall opening to formal lounge, dining and family/rumpus rooms, modern and very spacious kitchen with gas cooking, 3 large bedrooms, family bathroom and very good size laundry with second toilet which could be easily converted in second bathroom if needed. Add to all this a double lock up garage, second single lock up garage, gas heating, air-conditioning, polished hard wood floors, tiles to wet areas and security alarm system to get the complete package. This magnificent property on a huge 877 sqm approx of land with extra wide above 20 metres street frontage presents a unique opportunity for future development. For more information call Rene Wrzos on 0413 330 357.

Description:
Start Planning This Property's Future
The land size of approx 637sqm means that, subject to council approval, you could redevelop the site of this 2-bedroom (built-in wardrobes) home with a dual occupancy project. Alternatively, the property would suit investors, or families wanting a home they can move into now and renovate/extend in the future. The home could benefit from completely refurbishing or simply refreshing the decor. Ceilings have decorative cornices, and there are stained timber architraves. Included is a lounge room with A/C, dining room, eat-in kitchen, laundry with adjoining utility room, a shower room, and a separate toilet. The large rear yard includes a covered patio and a shed plus a substantial fenced area. The location - in convenient distance to Monash University, Monash Medical Centre, schools, shops, public transport and recreation has appeal to a wide range of purchasers.
Terms: 10% deposit - 30 day settlement.

Description:
A REAL DELIGHT - OFFERS INVITED.
This property is presented to please a buyer who is seeking a comfortable and spacious home. On a reasonably large parcel of land approx 489sm with future potential to redevelop 2 units (stca). Comprising of front patio, wide entry with quality hardwood floors, 3 large bedrooms with mirrored sliding built in robes, spacious living space, modern kitchen with stainless steel stove and splashback, bathroom with Italian imported tiles and extra large shower, 2nd bathroom with large shower and toilet, sun filled manicured gardens ideal for entertaining behind high brick fence. Single lockup garage, 2 carports and 3000 litre water tank. Features: Entry with porcelain tiles, sun shade, split system air conditioner, ducted heating and quality window coverings. Located near train station, busses, Westall High School and a short stroll to Rosebank Avenue Shops, Clayton Shopping Centre and Springvale Shopping Centre. CALL NOW TO INSPECT 95444611

Description:
A CLASSIC HOME WITH A BRIGHT FUTURE AHEAD
In a court like position just a few doors from the entry to the beautiful Namatjira Park, this classic orange brick home offers many potential options for its future owner. The home would attract tenants in its current state giving it instant appeal for investors or if you were looking for your first home or a project to get your teeth stuck into, it could easily be renovated with a great base on which to improve, update and renovate. It features polished hardwood floors throughout that enhance the lounge room as well as the adjoining meals area incorporated in the renovated kitchen with stone benches and stainless cooking appliances. There are 3 bedrooms with floor to ceiling built in wardrobes as well as a study or 4th bedroom, a neat family bathroom, separate toilet and laundry. Extras such as ducted heating and evaporative cooling are welcome inclusions and outside you find a single carport plus a secure parking area and a rear set double garage with the additional height to accommodate a caravan, boat or trade vehicle. And aside from the park you can easily access buses and all of central Clayton's shops, cafes and train station in just minutes.

Description:
A HIDDEN OASIS
Very private and very stylish, this home on a compact and easily maintained block guarantees impressive privacy for its new occupants. Set behind a stunning all Merbau fence the home gives away little from the street but when you step through the gate you are greeted by a landscaped front courtyard with paved entertaining area and the beautifully painted grey weatherboard style facade. Inside, natural light and tasteful splashes of colour give it style and personality to match its instant comfort. The open living/dining area features Spotted Gum flooring, a gas log fire and a split system air condition while the adjoining kitchen features an upright gas oven/stove. There are 3 bedrooms including 2 with built in wardrobes as well as a gorgeous bathroom with claw foot bath and a separate toilet. Additional features include external window awnings and the bonus of a garage/workshop that can accommodate up to 2 cars with additional room in front for 2 more. A great location completes the picture with buses nearby and you can walk to central Clayton's shops and train station in minutes.

Description:
Best Location! Walk to Everything!
This fantastic fully renovated three bedrooms unit will appeal to both the first home buyers and the astute investors. Presenting a rare and perfect opportunity within walking distance to Westall Train Station, Westall Secondary College, Westall Primary School, minutes drive to Clayton Community Centre (with swimming pool and library), Clayton Central Shopping District, Monash Medical Centre, Monash University and IKEA shopping centre.
This beautifully full renovated residence is comprised of huge living and dining area, separate modern kitchen, 3 large bedrooms with BIRs, modern central bathroom and 2 separate toilets, split system, as well as a huge private courtyard, perfect for children's play area entertaining family and friends.
Don't miss your chance and inspect today!
